title: How to write & conduct effective performance appraisals. V.3
brief_description: Program leader Jimmy Calano provides a seminar presentation to assist managers in developing their staff. Being an effective manager is not just a matter of telling employees how they’re doing. They need to know where they fit in the big picture and how to contribute on a higher level. Learn how to fairly praise and criticise your people in order to inspire renewed commitment to their jobs.
